channel.title: Upcoming PK server
channel.description:
Upcoming PK server @ [url=http://3hit.net/forums]~ Upcoming PK server ~ Go join now![/url]
Post suggestions, The players will be listened too, It will be based from players suggestions.

item.title: Upcoming PK server
item.dc:creator: @OldSkoolRSC OldSkoolRSC
item.description:
@OldSkoolRSC wrote:

[quote=“Lets PK, post:12, topic:353312”]Afker, Dont post in my thread if you have nothing better to say, Or nothing server related, Or suggestion related.
Thanks.[/quote]

What do u think this is?

The_AFKer:

Advice: Forget what players want to see. Why? because it’s been done before, and guess what happens? They change their minds. You can’t please everyone, set a goal of what you want changed, follow it through and people will either love it or hate it.

lol swoosh…theres a difference between hosting a server and receiveing money to cover hosting fees and hosting a server that receives more money then hosting fees requires, pocketing the rest n never lowering subscription cost to only cover the said hosting fees…

Read full topic

item.title: Upcoming PK server
item.dc:creator: @Lets_PK Lets PK
item.description:
@Lets_PK wrote:

Afker, Dont post in my thread if you have nothing better to say, Or nothing server related, Or suggestion related.

Thanks.

Read full topic

item.title: Upcoming PK server
item.dc:creator: @Old_Rsc_Player Old Rsc Player
item.description:
@Old_Rsc_Player wrote:

Advice: Forget what players want to see. Why? because it's been done before, and guess what happens? They change their minds. You can't please everyone, set a goal of what you want changed, follow it through and people will either love it or hate it.

We have a permanent “base” that we are not willing to change. Players voices of course have a limit… but its not shutdown.

Read full topic

item.title: Upcoming PK server
item.dc:creator: @The_AFKer The_AFKer
item.description:
@The_AFKer wrote:

[quote=“Old Rsc Player, post:8, topic:353312”][quote author=The_AFKer link=topic=449637.msg3299401#msg3299401 date=1281192172]

Mapus great ideas ( admin )

Tbh I think you should half emulate pokemon through the RSC game engine. Might attract more people and would be something different (and awesome)

Go fishing for pokemonz yay. And equip certain pokemons (who are trained) and they make ur stats up in the wildy.

Do what rs2 did and multiply all combat LCMs n hits etc by 10 just because

Also read something about him trying to suggest runecrafting…cant find it now…post was prolly removed for being too gay.

Mapu is not the head leader of the project and the server is not about pokemon (even though it might be a good idea… it was punKs creation nobody elses.

That alone would make someone not interested in this server. Why not be open to creativeness? No one wants to play a replica of another PK server that someone probably tried making. Seriously, even if it doesn’t make sense, it would attract people based on it’s uniqueness since nothing atm will beat out RSCE.
[/quote]

The server is based on what players want to see. So if enough players want it. Its defiantly an available option[/quote]

Advice: Forget what players want to see. Why? because it’s been done before, and guess what happens? They change their minds. You can’t please everyone, set a goal of what you want changed, follow it through and people will either love it or hate it.

Read full topic

item.title: Upcoming PK server
item.dc:creator: @sw0o0sh sw0o0sh
item.description:
@sw0o0sh wrote:

[quote=“OldSkoolRSC, post:7, topic:353312”][quote author=The_AFKer link=topic=449637.msg3299401#msg3299401 date=1281192172]
That alone would make someone not interested in this server. Why not be open to creativeness? No one wants to play a replica of another PK server that someone probably tried making. Seriously, even if it doesn’t make sense, it would attract people based on it’s uniqueness since nothing atm will beat out RSCE.
[/quote]

Yeah ud think someone with half a brain would realize this already…instead we get the same old shit being released by new servers over and over sigh

btw RSCE sucks balls, anyone playing that is funding faglukes wallet[/quote]
Why are people so concerned about the Money somebody makes with their private server? It’s almost like there is an under tone of jealousy in this community for anybody who has a server that “makes” it. Man if there’s 3 to call a server provider greedy for every 100 players they have subscribing I can only imagine the conspirators trying to poke a stick at JaGeX. Oh, wait?

Read full topic

Seriously, even if it doesn’t make sense, it would attract people based on it’s uniqueness since nothing atm will beat out RSCE.[/quote]

The server is based on what players want to see. So if enough players want it. Its defiantly an available option
